sentences.sContent: He was modelling for the stone effigy which in the fullness of time would adorn his tomb.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was modelling for the stone effigy which in the fullness of time would adorn his tomb.
sentences.sCn: 他正在塑造一幅到时候会用来装饰他自己坟墓的碑石肖像。

sentences.sContent: In Paraguay, people create an effigy and dress him up like a scarecrow when the new year comes.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Paraguay, people create an effigy and dress him up like a scarecrow when the new year comes.
sentences.sCn: 每逢新年来临，巴拉圭人都会专门制作雕像，然后把雕像打扮成稻草人的样子。

remMethod.val: ef(出) + fig(塑造) + y → 塑造出外形 → 雕像
